faqs.q: How many calories in half a banana?
faqs.a: Approximately 52 kcal for half a medium banana.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in half a banana?
faqs.a: About 13.5 g carbs, including 1.55 g fiber and 7.2 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is half a banana a good low-calorie snack?
faqs.a: Yes, at ~52 kcal, it's filling due to fiber and potassium, but watch portions for sugar intake.

faqs.q: How does banana size affect calories in half?
faqs.a: Smaller halves have fewer calories (e.g., ~42 kcal); larger ones up to ~70 kcal.

faqs.q: Does cooking a banana change its calories?
faqs.a: Baking or frying adds minimal calories unless oil or sugar is used; raw is standard.
